programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: The Return of the Mogul's Return
programme.desc: Jarrod goes bidding with a hangover which Brandi fears will hold him back, while Dave will not let a fight with Laura keep him away from an auction.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A customer offers the team a gambling set - complete with concealed weapons - while Chumlee questions the value of a Snoop Dogg doll.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Chumlee takes over from Antwaun as the shop's security guard, while the team values a drum from the American Civil War and a motorcycle club uniform.

programme.title: American Restoration
programme.desc: Pawn Stars' Rick Dale and his team take delivery of a unique scale model of a 1932 Hudson car, embarking on a museum-quality makeover.

programme.title: American Restoration
programme.desc: Rick and his team restore a vintage arcade boxing game.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: The heaviest lift in two seasons pushes Jamie and the team to their limits, leaving them struggling to complete the rescue and get traffic on the Coquihalla Highway moving again.

programme.title: Stan Lee's Superhumans
programme.desc: A man who can survive a 35ft belly-flop into a pool of water, a sauna champion capable of withstanding extreme heat and the world's fastest gunslinger.

programme.title: Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Detectives talk to a host of suspects when the dismembered body of a chef is discovered.

programme.title: Strippers: Cars for Cash
programme.desc: The teams trawl scrap metal heaps for bargain Japanese car parts. While one tackles a Subaru Impreza, the other strips a Mitsubishi Lancer Evo.

programme.title: Open All Hours
programme.desc: A squeak on Granville's bike interferes with his hopes of romance, and Arkwright worries about a mysterious visitor to a house in Atkinson Terrace.

programme.title: Open All Hours
programme.sub-title: How to Ignite Your Errand Boy
programme.desc: Arkwright decides to make his own product, unhappy at the amount of profit lost to middlemen, and instructs Granville to come up with a suitable idea for something that is in daily demand, yet cheap and simple to make. Comedy, starring Ronnie Barker and David Jason.

programme.title: Open All Hours
programme.desc: Arkwright has a rival for Nurse Gladys Emmanuel's attention, as a visitor from Australia - and an old flame of hers- returns to his old stomping ground.

programme.title: War Factories
programme.desc: The story of America's ‘Liberty Ships', which were produced in incredible numbers and became known as the Model T Fords of the ocean.

programme.title: Battle Factory
programme.desc: The documentary continues with a look at an aluminum parajet used by the military, drug enforcement agencies and first responders, and a hovercraft made using PVC panels filled with air.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: Feature-length episode. Nikki is asked to give evidence at the appeal of convicted murderer David Bennetto, and when her testimony leads to his release, she ends up locking horns with DI Rachel Klein, who put the man away six years earlier. It seems the detective is right when another young man is found dead at the scene of the original crime. Has Nikki helped to free a serial killer? Emilia Fox stars, with appearances from Tobias Menzies, Michael Socha and Aaron McCusker.

programme.title: The House of Eliott
programme.desc: The successful spring collection brings a surprise proposal for the future that threatens the sisters' partnership.

programme.title: Lovejoy
programme.desc: An antique Berber rug spells intrigue for the roguish dealer, leading him into a world of unrequited love and umbrella stands. Meanwhile, Lady Jane splits from her husband after refusing to accompany him to Hong Kong for his new job. Virginia McKenna guest stars.

programme.desc: They say there's something magical about Christmas...and we say, it's probably these Christmas songs from such great movies.

programme.desc: Once again the famous Magic Christmas provides the soundtrack to your seasonal celebrations. We'll be playing all your festive favourites until you've finished your final turkey sandwich.

programme.title: Up All Night! Kiss Beats
programme.desc: Let the world sleep! But here at Kiss we are still up, still delivering the finest beats for your nocturnal jam.

programme.title: The Fresh List
programme.desc: Keep up to date with some of the hottest new videos dropping right now, from some of your favourite artists and introducing some brand new artists.

programme.desc: Tune in to these super-hot hits and the latest trending videos. Look no further for today's music fix.

programme.title: All The Hits, All Night

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: The production of tequila from cactus plants in Mexico, and how steam helps to power New York City.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike Brewer visits Idaho to buy a Karmann Ghia, but a broken gearbox and damaged interior could stop him and Edd China from making a profit on the sale of the restored vehicle.

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars
programme.desc: Car restorer Wayne Carini enjoys his Austin Cooper twin-engine Mini at Monterey and sells his 2001 MV Augusta F4 and 1967 275 GTB/4 Ferrari alloy body car at auction.

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars
programme.desc: Car restorer Wayne Carini races his 1958 Tojeiro Climax in the Hershey Grand Ascent and the VSCCA Vintage Fall Finale at Lime Rock Park.

programme.title: World's Deadliest Drivers
programme.desc: More than 50 million people are injured every year on the roads, sparking a boom in dashboard cameras that has captured a wealth of fascinating and surprising footage.

programme.title: World's Deadliest Drivers
programme.desc: More than 50 million people are injured every year on the roads, sparking a boom in dashboard cameras that has captured a wealth of fascinating and surprising footage.

programme.title: Destroyed in Seconds
programme.desc: Two cranes collapse at a construction site, there is a spectacular crash on a notorious ski run and a firework explosion shatters windows. Presented by Ron Pitts.

programme.title: Destroyed in Seconds
programme.desc: Ron Pitts presents footage of diners being hit by a tornado and bus crashes.

programme.title: Swamp Loggers
programme.desc: Tempers flare between the loggers, and a massive beaver dam is removed when it creates flooding in the swamp.

programme.title: Overhaulin'
programme.sub-title: John Nivens' 1972 Lotus Europa - Part Two
programme.desc: The second part of the restoration of the 1972 Lotus Europe, which was nominated by Jay Leno to be Overhauled for John Niven.

programme.title: FBI Files
programme.desc: Officers reveal a sophisticated burglary with estimated losses of £8million when they investigate why a bank manager is unable to open his vault.

programme.title: Forensic Detectives
programme.desc: The forensic evidence presented in the OJ Simpson trial - the murder investigation and subsequent televised trial that took America by storm.

programme.title: Murder on CCTV
programme.desc: The case of millionaire entrepreneur Rick Chance, who was brutally gunned down in a hotel room. To catch the killer, detectives turned to surveillance video for help.

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.desc: The case of 62-year-old Narleen Campton, who was found murdered in her home, apparently having been tortured, during Thanksgiving 2011 in Newport, Washington. Though Jeremy Bryant confessed to his involvement, doubt remains over whether he acted alone.

programme.title: FBI Files
programme.desc: The investigation into the murder of New Jersey state trooper Phillip Lamanco, whose killers were connected to terrorism.

programme.title: Animal Cops Phoenix
programme.desc: Emergency animal medical technician AJ Meadows battles to save seven dogs locked in an overheated car with no food or water.

programme.title: Bondi Vet
programme.desc: Dr Chris takes us into the world of one of Sydney's busiest vets. A labrador is brought in with bulging eyeballs, and 60-year-old tortoise Hugo needs a mate.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Two brides are torn between a sexy look or a traditional one - and a disapproving father knows which he would prefer to see his daughter wearing.
